temples.history: The Phoenix Temple was announced May 9, 2018 and they broke ground on June 4, 2011. It was officially dedicated on November 16, 2014.

temples.services: Clothing rental available, no cafeteria available, no patron housing available, distribution center nearby
temples.history: The McAllen, Texas temple was announced on October 5, 2019 and broke ground on November 21, 2020. It is expected to be dedicated and open in late 2022 or early 2023.
